title: Yojee
html:
Overview

Established in 2010 and headquartered in Singapore, Yojee is the best-in-class logistics software that utilizes Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning to optimize and manage delivery operations. The company raised more than A$ 17.1M. I worked mainly on mobile apps with React Native.

  • Website: https://yojee.com/

Role

I'm the main mobile developer and lead other in-house developers to deliver mobile apps for the business customer. As you know, Yojee provides a solution platform where other companies can customize to serve their logistics business. So we need to customize the mobile app with different looks and feels and features for each client.

Outstanding numbers during my time

  • Customized different label app for 10 clients.
  • Enhance the performance of the app, it's 50% faster than the old. I have the review result in the beginning (Note: some contents may out of date at this time): https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I7rAqiqR94gO5cEZ5mxaO2gEO0M49Z_kR6RfsudKP-w/edit

Outstanding solutions and technologies

  • Real-time location based
  • Rich Maps and Places API
  • In-house feature flags for different clients.
  • One source code but can bundle for different clients.
  • CI/CD with fastlane, Bitrise for mobile and Jenkins for backend, web front-end
  • Automation testing with Selenium, Appium
  • Mobile monitoring with Bugsnag and Firebase Crashlytics
  • And more features Push Notification, Deep linking, etc
